docs.snippet: Shares of Snap Inc jumped 9 percent on Wednesday after the owner of messaging app Snapchat received a second analyst "buy" rating following a red-hot public listing this month and with Wall Street skeptical about its lofty valuation....

docs.snippet: A teenager who was shot in the face could have survived had he received immediate medical attention, a forensic pathologist testified Wednesday in the trial of the alleged shooter who's also accused of taking a selfie of the dying teen and fleeing...
